padcms.kiosk.view.action

Class ProgressHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Handler
      • padcms.kiosk.view.action.ProgressHandler

  • public class ProgressHandler
extends Handler
    Handler of incoming messages from Threads executed tasks of downloading files and extractring it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Sends message to oneself with new state of current file

      Send message with max value of progress.

      Sets BasicViewController object which represents view and is responsible for the displaying of the task process.
